document_data.name: Syndra Wands
document_data.mainbody: '''Syndra Wands''' was a [[human]] spellcaster and member of the [[Wands]] noble house of [[Waterdeep]]. She lived in [[Syndra Wands' Tower]] in the [[Castle Ward of Waterdeep|Castle Ward]] of the city.
document_data.Relatives: Syndra was the granddaughter of [[Khelben "Blackstaff" Arunsun]].
document_data.Background: In [[1238 DR]], the lich [[Priamon "Frostrune" Rakesk]] entered Syndra's home while she was sleeping and killed her by freezing her and smashing her body.
